        • boolean aliasExists(java.lang.String alias)

          Checks whether an alias exists

          Parameters:
          alias - the name of the alias
          Returns:

        • void createIndex(java.lang.String index, java.util.Map settings = null)

          Creates a new index

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index
          settings - The index settings (ie. number of shards)

        • void createIndex(java.lang.String index, java.lang.Integer version, java.util.Map settings = null)

          Creates a new index

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index
          version - the version number, if provided _v will be used
          settings - The index settings (ie. number of shards)

        • void createMapping(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String type, java.util.Map elasticMapping)

          Creates mappings on a type

          Parameters:
          index - The index where the mapping is being created
          type - The type where the mapping is created
          elasticMapping - The mapping definition

        • void deleteAlias(java.lang.String alias)

          Deletes an alias pointing to an index

          Parameters:
          alias - The name of the alias

        • void deleteIndex(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> indices = null)

          Delete one or more index and all its data.

          Parameters:
          indices - The indices to delete. If null, will delete ALL indices.

        • void deleteIndex(java.lang.String... indices)

          Delete one or more index and all its data.

          Parameters:
          indices - The indices to delete. If null, will delete ALL indices.

        • void deleteIndex(java.lang.Class... searchableClasses)

          Delete one or more index and all its data.

          Parameters:
          indices - The indices to delete in the form of searchable class(es).

        • void deleteIndex(java.lang.String index, java.lang.Integer version = null)

          Deletes a version of an index

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index
          version - the version number, if provided _v will be used

        • void deleteMapping(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String type)

          Deletes a mapping on an index

          Parameters:
          index - The index the mapping will be deleted on
          type - The type which mapping will be deleted

        • java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIndices()

          Returns all the indices

          Parameters:
          prefix - the prefix
          Returns:
          a Set of index names

        • java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIndices(java.lang.String prefix)

          Returns all the indices starting with a prefix

          Parameters:
          prefix - the prefix
          Returns:
          a Set of index names

        • int getLatestVersion(java.lang.String index)

          The current version of the index

          Parameters:
          index
          Returns:
          the current version if any exists, -1 otherwise

        • int getNextVersion(java.lang.String index)

          The next available version for an index

          Parameters:
          index - the index name
          Returns:
          an integer representing the next version to be used for this index (ie. 10 if the latest is _v<9>)

        • boolean indexExists(java.lang.String index, java.lang.Integer version = null)

          Checks whether the index exists

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index
          version - the version number, if provided _v will be used
          Returns:
          true, if the index exists

        • java.lang.String indexPointedBy(java.lang.String alias)

          Returns the name of the index pointed by an alias

          Parameters:
          alias - The alias to be checked
          Returns:
          the name of the index

        • boolean mappingExists(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String type)

          Check whether a mpping exists

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index to check on
          type - The type which mapping is being checked
          Returns:
          true if the mapping exists

        • void pointAliasTo(java.lang.String alias, java.lang.String index, java.lang.Integer version = null)

          Makes an alias point to a new index, removing the relationship with a previous index, if any

          Parameters:
          alias - the alias to be created/modified
          index - the index to be pointed to
          version - the version number, if provided _v will be used

        • void refresh(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> indices = null)

          Explicitly refresh one or more index, making all operations performed since the last refresh available for search This method will also flush all pending request in the indexRequestQueue and will wait for their completion.

          Parameters:
          indices - The indices to refresh. If null, will refresh ALL indices.

        • void refresh(java.lang.String... indices)

          Explicitly refresh one or more index, making all operations performed since the last refresh available for search This method will also flush all pending request in the indexRequestQueue and will wait for their completion.

          Parameters:
          indices - The indices to refresh. If null, will refresh ALL indices.

        • void refresh(java.lang.Class... searchableClasses)

          Explicitly refresh ALL index, making all operations performed since the last refresh available for search This method will also flush all pending request in the indexRequestQueue and will wait for their completion.

          Parameters:
          searchableClasses - The indices represented by the specified searchable classes to refresh. If null, will refresh ALL indices.

        • java.lang.String versionIndex(java.lang.String index, java.lang.Integer version = null)

          Builds an index name based on a base index and a version number

          Parameters:
          index
          version
          Returns:
          _v if version is provided, otherwise

          Waits for the cluster to be on Yellow status

          Waits for the specified version of the index to exist

          Parameters:
          index - The name of the index
          version - the version number
